EGT.manual_text: Perform high-pressure turbine borescope inspection per AMM 72-00. Check for blade glazing or erosion.

FF.manual_text: Inspect fuel nozzle flow rate and check for blockages. Verify HMU (Hydro-Mechanical Unit) output.

N1.manual_text: Check fan blades for foreign object damage (FOD). Measure leading edge erosion limits.

N2.manual_text: Inspect compressor shaft alignment and bearing sump pressure.

VRTG.manual_text: Conduct structural stress test on landing gear struts. Check oleo servicing and seal integrity.

HYDY.manual_text: Pressure test main hydraulic actuators. Check for internal bypassing or external leaks.

VIB.manual_text: Inspect aft engine mount bolts for torque loss and structural fatigue. Perform vibration spectrum survey.

OIL_P.manual_text: Inspect main oil pressure pump filter and scavenge screens for metal particles.

OIL_T.manual_text: Check fuel/oil heat exchanger for bypass operation. Inspect thermostatic valve function.

LATP.manual_text: Calibration check required on Air Data Inertial Reference Unit (ADIRU). Verify GNSS inputs.

LONP.manual_text: Calibration check required on Air Data Inertial Reference Unit (ADIRU). Verify GNSS inputs.

ALT.manual_text: Inspect static ports for blockage (ice/tape). Perform pitot-static leak check.

VEL.manual_text: Inspect pitot tube heater functionality and drain hole clearance.

TH.manual_text: Check Throttle Lever Angle (TLA) resolver calibration. Verify FADEC input signal integrity.

FLAP.manual_text: Inspect flap drive unit and ballscrew mechanism for skew or binding.
